nodes.bodyText: Why is the second ! needed here? Makes it look really strange :D
I made it similar to other exercise components
Maybe simply name the unused variable _. Its a common convention :) Or maybe remove the parameter if you never use it? I did not immediately see a reason for keeping it
because the output event gives the changed model, otherwise we have a compiler error in the html template - _ does not fix the linting error according to my IDE
